content:
It looks like neither asm! nor global_asm! are re-exported from std, at least based on the rustdoc pages -- this seems like an oversight, right?

(Note that a fix needs to be backported to beta)

cc @Josh Triplett
but the documentation search doesn't list them
which seems unfortunate, though has always(?) been the case
pub use core::arch has been marked as #[doc(no_inline)] with a comment of "Note (#82861): required for correct documentation"
The comment above talks about how it is necessary to make documentation available for all targets.
Hm. Seems unfortunate -- I wonder if we should manually re-export each mod in there or at least the macros
